## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (eb7c06f5d6f486be7f222de0846ed53e9a8816767492d9cf59b88db7ba63e390)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'docker-centos-hello' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
